message: Let's be fair and split it 60-40. You'll still get a good amount!
Your offer was a bit too much in your favor, Alice. How about a slightly more balanced split this time?
I've thought it over, and I'm willing to compromise. This is the most even split I can offer.
Alice, let's stop wasting time.  A 50/50 split is the fairest and ensures we both benefit before inflation eats away at the value. Deal?
